page.title: 04CLUBS
page.content: The Lyneal_cum_Colemere W.I. has 25 members and was formed in 1933. President _ Mrs. Jean Davies Treasurer _ Mrs. Eileen Sumner Secretary _ Mrs. Ann Williams The meetings are held in Lyneal School on the first Thursday in each month, starting at 7.15 and ending at 10pm. Every month, 2 ladies make refreshments for the meeting. It is worked on a rota basis. Every meeting, they have a speaker. Some of the talks have been about irons, tips on dressmaking, music and cartoons and the care of feet. Annually, they have a mystery trip. Last time,they ended up at a village inn and had a basket meal. The W.I. raises money and some of it is sent to charities. This information was supplied by a member, Mrs. K. Lewis.
